Introduction

Hayan, formerly known as Hayang, is a South Korean singer, rapper, dancer and model under Dan-ah Entertainment. She is a member of the upcoming girl group DIVA-X and a former member of the girl group LoveUs. She signed with Brick Works Company in 2018 as a soloist and made her solo debut with “Thirsty”. After she released her first mixtape, she left Brick Works in April, 2019.
